Every other year a workshop is held in Sweden or Brazil. The idea behind the workshop activities are to present mineral aspects/problems /solutions regarding mineral technology, policies, economics and legislation that are both particular to each country or common to both countries. Sweden and Brazil, both, have a large mineral and metallurgical asset, and the exchanging of knowledge, technologies and ideas will greatly contribute to the fostering of the minerals field in its path towards a sustainable development. This edition presents "some of the contributions that were presented at the Sala meeting in May 1995. Not all of the presentations are available, since the workshop has a more informal format and no need to have written papers.
